4.name: Three Sacred Treasures
4.effect: #{hero} gets +50% defence, +50% magic defence and +50% speed until she leaves the battlefield.

5.name: Roc-Killing Fist
5.effect: #{hero} takes 40 damage if Roc-Killing Fist misses.
details: #{this} misses if the enemy is immune to it, or uses a skill such as Block.
#{this} does not miss if #{hero} is stunned or otherwise prevented from using the ability.

6.name: Youkai Orb of Unknown Mechanics
6.effect: Lose 10 HP and summon a Hourai Doll. Hourai Doll gives #{hero} +100% to all stats. Hourai Doll is removed at end of turn if #{hero} takes damage from an attack.
details: #{hero} can only have one Hourai Doll at a time.
Hourai Doll is removed immediately if #{hero} switches out.

7.name: Hell's Artificial Sun
7.effect: A heatwave begins, lasting for 5 turns. Fire attacks get +50% power and water attacks get -50% power.
details: Other weather effects such as rain and fog are removed.
When the heatwave ends, fire and water attacks go back to their normal power.

9.name: Cold Snap
9.effect: If there is a blizzard, the enemy gets -50% speed until they leave the battlefield.

10.name: Boundary of Form and Emptiness
10.effect: #{hero} gets +50% magic attack and +50% magic defence until she leaves the battlefield.

12.name: Illusionary Waterfall
12.effect: Illusionary Waterfall always deals at least 25 damage.
